types:type.name: invoice
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type invoice = {| externalId: String, entity: {| internalId: String, externalId: Null, "type": Null |}, subsidiary: {| internalId: String, externalId: Null, "type": Null |}, memo: String, account: {| internalId: String, externalId: Null, "type": Null |}, isTaxable: Boolean, taxItem: {| internalId: String, externalId: Null, "type": Null |}, taxRate: Null, billAddressList: {| internalId: String |}, itemList: {| item: Array<{| item: {| internalId: String |}, description: String, line: String, quantity: String, rate: String, isTaxable: Boolean, customFieldList: {| customField: Array<{| value: String, scriptId: String |}> |} |}> |}, customFieldList: {| customField: Array<{| scriptId: String, value: String |}> |} |} {"example": "{\"externalId\":\"GS1-89-09894014\",\"entity\":{\"internalId\":\"15\",\"externalId\":null,\"type\":null},\"subsidiary\":{\"internalId\":\"4\",\"externalId\":null,\"type\":null},\"memo\":\"Case 1 \u2013 Hybris Order (SS;SI)\",\"account\":{\"internalId\":\"120\",\"externalId\":null,\"type\":null},\"isTaxable\":false,\"taxItem\":{\"internalId\":\"-7\",\"externalId\":null,\"type\":null},\"taxRate\":null,\"billAddressList\":{\"internalId\":\"1\"},\"itemList\":{\"item\":[{\"item\":{\"internalId\":\"9\"},\"description\":\"Adult Membership\",\"line\":\"1\",\"quantity\":\"2\",\"rate\":\"100\",\"isTaxable\":false,\"customFieldList\":{\"customField\":[{\"value\":\"2019-09-08T21:00:00\",\"scriptId\":\"custcol_vol2_startdate\"},{\"value\":\"2020-09-08T21:00:00\",\"scriptId\":\"custcol_vol2_enddate\"},{\"value\":\"First Last\",\"scriptId\":\"custcol_vol2_fa_approved_by\"},{\"value\":\"4\",\"scriptId\":\"custcol_vol2_council\"},{\"value\":\"2019-09-08T21:00:00\",\"scriptId\":\"custcol_vol2_fa_approved_date\"},{\"value\":\"7\",\"scriptId\":\"custcol_vol2_financial_aid_source\"},{\"value\":\"GSUSA Membership\",\"scriptId\":\"custcol_vol2_hybrisitem\"},{\"value\":\"1\",\"scriptId\":\"custcol_vol2_hybrislinenumber\"},{\"value\":\"2\",\"scriptId\":\"custcol_vol2_particiapant_type\"},{\"scriptId\":\"cseg_vol2_gsusa_id\",\"value\":\"1\"},{\"value\":\"First Last\",\"scriptId\":\"custcol_vol2_participant_name\"},{\"value\":\"Troop\",\"scriptId\":\"custcol_vol2_troop\"},{\"scriptId\":\"cseg_vol2_hybris_id\",\"value\":\"202\"}]}}]},\"customFieldList\":{\"customField\":[{\"scriptId\":\"cseg_vol2_hybris_id\",\"value\":\"202\"},{\"scriptId\":\"cseg_vol2_gsusa_id\",\"value\":\"1\"},{\"value\":\"GS1\",\"scriptId\":\"custbody_vol2_hybriscouncilid\"},{\"value\":\"8291069JACK\",\"scriptId\":\"custbody_vol2_customer_name\"}]}}"}

types:type.name: addListOutput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type addListOutput = Array<{| recType: {| scriptId: String, "type": String |}, name: String|}> {"example": "[{\"recType\":{\"scriptId\":\"customrecord_cseg_vol2_hybris_id\",\"type\":\"CUSTOM_RECORD_TYPE\"},\"name\":\"ABCDE\"},{\"recType\":{\"scriptId\":\"customrecord_cseg_vol2_gsusa_id\",\"type\":\"CUSTOM_RECORD_TYPE\"},\"name\":\"EFJHOI\"}]"}

types:type.name: addCasegOutput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type addCasegOutput = {| gsusaId: String, hybris: String |} {"example": "{\"gsusaId\":\"783\",\"hybris\":\"782\"}"}

types:type.name: inputAddRec
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type inputAddRec = Array<{| externalId: String, internalId: String, scriptId: Null, name: Null, typeId: String|}> {"example": "[{\"externalId\":\"302\",\"internalId\":\"1505\",\"scriptId\":null,\"name\":null,\"typeId\":\"15\"},{\"externalId\":\"1\",\"internalId\":\"407\",\"scriptId\":null,\"name\":null,\"typeId\":\"14\"}]"}
